text.section: If a right is acquired, extinguished, or barred upon the expiration of a prescribed period that has commenced to run under any other statute before July 15, 2014, that statute continues to apply to the right even if it has been repealed or superseded.

This chapter shall not apply to trusts created under the following:
KRS 386.510 to 386.590, the Kentucky Fiduciary Investment Company Act;
KRS 386.370 to 386.440, the Kentucky Business Trusts Act; and
KRS Chapter 386A, the Kentucky Uniform Statutory Trust Act.

law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 94, effective July 15, 2014.
